name: ss2rabdv
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))

stmt.origin: sylibr(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wb(wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

body.origin: |- wb(wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))

comment: Deduction of restricted abstraction subclass from implication. (Contributed by NM, 30-May-2006.)
